channel.title: Home
channel.description: Astro Nano is a minimal and lightweight blog and portfolio.

item.title: How I Securely Exposed Argo CD Without Managing TLS
item.description: Using Cloudflare Tunnel and Traefik to expose Argo CD with HTTPS, while running everything inside my K3s homelab on plain HTTP.

item.title: Fixing Argo CD 404 Behind Traefik and Cloudflare Tunnel
item.description: How I debugged a 404 error when exposing Argo CD with Traefik Ingress and Cloudflare Tunnel, and what caused it.

item.title: Astro Nano
item.description: Minimal portfolio and blog build with astro and no frameworks.
